titleStmt.title: A godly and fruitfull sermon preached at Lieth in Scotland by a faithfull minister of Gods holy Gospell
titleStmt.author: Murray, John, 1575?-1632, attributed name. aut

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Murray on leaf *2r of: Informations, or a protestation, and a treatise from Scotland (STC 14084).
The sermon was actually preached in Edinburgh and was printed in London without the authors consent--Folger Shakespeare Library catalog.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
